text: Bersøglis- og andre Viser is a poetry collection published by Norwegian poet Per Sivle in 1895. Among its poems are "Vaar-Von", "Vi vil os et Land -" and "Haust". Literary historian Kristian Elster characterized Bersøglis- og andre Viser as Sivle's most outstanding poetry collection. ==References== Category:1895 poetry books Category:Poetry collections Category:Norwegian poetry
title: Bersøglis- og andre Viser
